qas.question: Who got a spot in the top 12 after Mario Vasquez dropped out?
Who replaced Vasquez as a finalist?
A former employee states he was fired after complaining about which finalist?

context: The top 12 finalists originally included Mario <a3_0>Vazquez<a3_0/>, but he dropped out citing 'personal reasons' and was replaced by <a0_0><a1_0>Nikko Smith<a1_0/><a0_0/>. Later, an employee of <a2_0>Freemantle Media<a2_0/>, which produces the show, sued the company for wrongful termination, claiming that he was dismissed after complaining about lewd behavior by Vazquez toward him during the show.
